Articles.Content:
I heard from another thread <http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/archive/index.php/t-18506.html> that someone was considering mission control Tshirts...

Personally, I REALLY like the idea, and I would gladly buy one if it became available. Are there any plans to make such Tshirts? if so, when?

(I dont like white, but if someone thinks that it would look the best, I would still buy it. Cream maybe? Something that would look good with the logo)
